屯區.definition: Tun District – area of Taichung (in Taiwan) between the coastal (western) part of the city and the mountains to the east

屯墾.definition: to garrison troops to open up land

屯戍.definition: to garrison; to defend (a frontier); soldier garrisoned at a frontier

屯溪.definition: Tunxi District of Huangshan 黃山市|黄山市[Huang2shan1 Shi4], Anhui

屯溪區.definition: Tunxi District of Huangshan 黃山市|黄山市[Huang2shan1 Shi4], Anhui

屯門.definition: Tuen Mun district of New Territories, Hong Kong

屯駐.definition: to station; to quarter; to garrison
